Discover a curated collection of talks which dive into AI/ML applications and lessons learned by practitioners.

**Note**: Most of the videos on Nexus are publicly available on YouTube, but some (e.g., [#ML4MI](https://uw-madison-datascience.github.io/ML-X-Nexus/Applications/Videos/ML4MI/)) require a netID to view.
